sentences.en: But scans found women's brains showed emotional responses, while men's showed activity linked to sexual arousal.
sentences.cn: 然而通过扫描发现,女性的大脑显示出情感的变化, 男性的大脑则出现与性有关的反应.

sentences.en: For instance , one set of manikins represented arousal reactions, ranging from disinterested to excited.
sentences.cn: 这些研究结果似乎跟充斥于女性杂志中的各种性感广告相矛盾.

sentences.en: I asked as a primitive sense of arousal kicked in at the base of my medulla.
sentences.cn: 真够神的，”我回答说，脑子里似乎有一种原始的欲望在觉醒，在升腾。

sentences.en: Individual deviation in expected behavior causes arousal or alertness in others.
sentences.cn: 偏离预期的行为会激怒他人或使他人警觉.

sentences.en: It distracts us, and takes our arousal back to the starting blocks.
sentences.cn: 它分散我们的注意力，使我们的觉醒又回到了起点。

sentences.en: It is quite normal for a woman to feel some sexual arousal while nursing her baby.
sentences.cn: 哺乳妇女在给孩子喂奶时感到有性唤起是完全正常的.

sentences.en: It may be desirable to go even further and identify three varieties of arousal.
sentences.cn: 再进一步分辨3种不同类型的激发,可能是有益的.

sentences.en: Masochism is for obtaining gratification or sexual arousal by having pain inflicted upon oneself.
sentences.cn: 自虐者通过给自身施加疼痛来获得满足或者性刺激.

sentences.en: On the negative side, the concepts of activation and arousal are rather amorphous.
sentences.cn: 从消极方面说, 引发和激发这两个概念是很难以捉摸的.

sentences.en: Results: With exploring factor analysis, 4 factors were extracted , i . e . Addictive Behavior, Emotional Arousal, Shame & amp ; Dissatisfaction and Dysfunction.
sentences.cn: 结果: 青少年网络游戏成瘾量表通过 探索性 因素分析得到4个因素: 成瘾行为 、 情绪唤起 、 羞耻不满和功能损害.

sentences.en: That is an area of the brain connected with emotional arousal.
sentences.cn: 大脑的该区域与情绪激发有关.

sentences.en: The purpose of art is the arousal of emotions.
sentences.cn: 艺术的目的是唤醒情感.

sentences.en: These episodes of arousal may last for hours and are uncomfortable and quite distressing.
sentences.cn: 这种性唤起现象可能会持续几个小时,令人感到非常的不自在和苦恼.

sentences.en: Thinking angry thoughts can provoke strong physiological arousal.
sentences.cn: 想着生气的事情能激起强烈的生理反应。

sentences.en: This " need arousal " can be due to the lifestyle of the individual.
sentences.cn: “ 需要的产生 ” 可能是来自于个人的生活方式.

sentences.en: Touch, vision, hearing, smell, and taste play an important role in all human sexual arousal.
sentences.cn: 触觉 、 视觉 、 听觉 、 嗅觉和味觉在人类性唤起中起着重要的作用.

sentences.en: Use this technique to control your level of arousal.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法来控制性兴奋程度。
